Detailed Description

Storm prevention implementation.

Contains functions for implementing a storm prevention scheme for the ICSS based ethernet switch. This is done through a credit based scheme where only a particular number of packets are allowed in a given amount of time, this is specified through a credit which expires at the end of a time period.
